CustomField.description: This is the lead's job title as it appears on the business card/Linkedin/Company profile. We do not pull reports or marketing by this field, we use Role for that, but you should make sure this is accurate as well.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is the lead's job title as it appears on the business card/Linkedin/Company profile. We do not pull reports or marketing by this field, we use Role for that, but you should make sure this is accurate as well.
